subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Six straight Cardinals got hits off Cubs starter Randy Wells, and St. Louis took a 5-0 lead in the first inning that Chris Carpenter made stand up in a 7-1 rout in Chicago.
snippet: Six straight Cardinals got hits off Cubs starter Randy Wells, and St. Louis took a 5-0 lead in the first inning that Chris Carpenter made stand up in a 7-1 rout in Chicago.
